title: # 297 - Whitney Cummings & ME
description:
Today I sit down with Whitney Cummings to talk about her career, how she started in comedy, the struggle of coming up, Comedy Central roasts, Roseanne, and much more!

This episode is brought to you by Beach Body. For your free 30 day trial membership text Bert to 303030

This episode is also brought to you by Birddogs shorts. Enter promo code "Bertcast" and get a free Dad Hat.

This episode is also brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast
